author: Staff Reporter
text:
A woman was killed and her husband seriously injured when the bike in which they were travelling was knocked down by a tipper lorry here on Wednesday.

Sakkarai (45) and his wife Thilaga (40) of Peya Gopuram Street here were heading towards a relative’s home in their bike. When they were about to enter a road near the Government Tiruvannamalai Medical College Hospital, a tipper lorry knocked them down. Thilaga died on the spot and Sakkarai was rushed to the hospital.
title: Woman killed in accident
